channel.title: The Weather Channel: Your Local Weather Outlook--Stockholm, Sweden
channel.description: Local Weather Outlook for Stockholm, Sweden. Since 1982, The Weather Channel has brought timely weather information to the world. Now via our Local Weather Outlook RSS feed we can keep you up-to-date on the latest weather affecting the cities of your choice including: current local conditions, local Doppler radar, pollen trends, regional video forecasts with expert commentary, and extended forecast details delivered right to your desktop. The Weather Channel...Bringing Weather To Life
channel.copyright: Copyright © 2006, The Weather Channel Interactive, Inc.

image.title: The Weather Channel: Local Weather Outlook
image.description: Local Weather Outlook from The Weather Channel

item.title: Current Weather Conditions In Stockholm, Sweden
item.description: Mostly Cloudy, and 52 ° F. For more details?

item.title: Your Local Doppler Radar
item.description: This map shows the location and intensity of precipitation in your area. The color of the precipitation corresponds to the rate at which it is falling. This map is updated every 15 minutes.

item.title: Video: Your Regional Weather Forecast
item.description: Watch what the experts at The Weather Channel® have to say about the weather trends in your area.

item.title: ADV: Upgrade to weather.com Gold!
item.description: Get advanced storm tracking maps and weather for 10 cities in one-click, all with no ads! Start your free trial now.

item.title: Your Weekend Forecast For Stockholm, Sweden
item.description: Chance of Precipitation: Fri: 10% / Sat: 10% / Sun: 10%. For complete forecast details...

item.title: Your 10-Day Forecast for Stockholm, Sweden
item.description: Today: Partly Cloudy & High 57°F / Low 48°F.---- Fri: Partly Cloudy & High 55°F / Low 45°F.---- Sat: Partly Cloudy & High 58°F / Low 43°F.---- Sun & Beyond.... For more details?
